text: Hankavenentake Ra Anumzamo'ma, kazama higenka'ma ha' vaheka'ama ha'ma huzamagatenerana Anumzankamo'a amanage hie, Nagri narimpa ahe'zamo'ma kapufima me'negenka'ma kazampi eri'nenkama nenenka neginagima hu'nana kapua ko eritre'noe. Ana hu'neanki'na henka'anena atrenugenka ana kapufintira narimpa ahe'zana onegahane.
